svg:
Medical Domain Data Architecture
External Data Sources
Medical PDFs Textbooks, Research
PubMed Articles Medical Research
Google Drive
Dropbox
Patient Intake Forms
YouTube & Podcasts
Ingestion Layer
Data Connectors • S3 Direct Upload • PDF Document Loader • PubMed API • Dropbox Integration • Google Drive • YouTube API • Podcast RSS Feeds Validation • Format Verification • Metadata Extraction • Ingestion Logging • Initial Quality Checks
S3 Data Lake
Raw Zone
Original Data • Medical PDFs • PubMed XML/JSON • Google Drive Files • Dropbox Documents • Patient Forms • YouTube Transcripts • Podcast Audio/Text • Source Metadata
Organization • By Source/Date • By Document Type
Retention • Full Retention • Infrequent Access (1yr)
Stage Zone
Standardized Formats • Extracted Text • Cleaned PubMed • Structured Documents • Enhanced Metadata • Audio Transcriptions • Video Metadata
Source Data Catalog • AWS Glue Tables • Source-to-Stage Mapping
Data Quality • Validation Records • Completeness Metrics • Mid-stage Lineage
Analytics Zone
AI-Ready Data • RAG-Ready Data • Medical Knowledge • Analytics Results • Preprocessed Files for Vectorization • Bedrock Function Call Inputs • Structured Clinical
LLM Fine-Tuning • Domain Corpus • Training Samples
Data Governance
DataChain
Security & Access • IAM & Bucket Policies • Encryption • Medical Data Controls
Audit & Compliance • CloudTrail & S3 Logs • Compliance Checks • HIPAA Controls
Data Management • AWS Glue Catalog • Custom Lineage • Retention Policies
DataChain Capabilities • Multimodal Dataset Versioning • Data Enrichment & Processing • Python-friendly Version Control
Version Control
GitHub Repository • Infrastructure as Code • Dagster Pipelines • DataChain Integration
Dagster Orchestration
Pipeline Management • Asset-Based Pipelines • Scheduled Jobs • Event Triggers • Pipes External Execution
Lambda Processors • PDF Text Extraction • Medical Term Extraction • Data Chunking for LLMs • Bedrock Automation
Observability • Pipeline Monitoring • Data Quality Checks • CloudWatch Integration • Alerting (SNS)
AI Applications & Outputs
Vector Database (Knowledge Base) • Medical Domain Content • Semantic Search Capability • Document Embeddings • Context Retrieval
AI Models
Fine-tuned Models Aesthetic Medicine Specialized Terminology
RAG-Enabled Knowledge Base Integration for Consultations
Data Services
DynamoDB • RAG Metadata Storage • Clinical Data Relations
Consultation Agents
Injection Planning Agent Treatment Recommendations
Laser Settings Agent``` Protocol Optimization
Patient Applications
Medical Education Bot • Procedure Explanations • Aftercare Instructions • FAQ & Treatment Details
